channel.title: Fun ::kill Command

item.title: Fun ::kill Command
item.dc:creator: @Ambriosa1 Ambriosa1
item.description:
@Ambriosa1 wrote:

Enjoy this kill command made by me. Hope you enjoy it.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("gotohell")) { p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 64); p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9847, 64, 2); p.frames.setNPCId(p, p.playerId, 64, 2); p.frames.setString(p, "Great God "+Misc.upperFirst(p.username)+"!", 64, 3); p.frames.setString(p, "Die, "+Misc.upperFirst(p.username)+"!", 64, 4); p.requestGFX(1621, 0); p.skillLvl[3] = 2147248639; p.appendHit(2147248639, 0); p.updateReq = true; for (Player player : Engine.players) p.frames.sendMessage(player, "The Great God "+Misc.upperFirst(p.username)+"!" has killed " +Misc.upperFirst(p.username) +"!"); }

Read full topic
